com.yolanda.nohttp.db

类 DBManager<T extends DBId>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yolanda.nohttp.db.DBManager<T>

  • public abstract class DBManager<T extends DBId>
extends Object

    Database management generic class, has realized the basic functions, inheritance of the subclass only need to implement replace(DBId), get(String) and getTableName().

    Created in Jan 10, 2016 8:18:28 PM.
    作者:
    Yan Zhenjie.

    • 构造器概要

      • getReader

        protected final android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getReader()
        Open the database when the read data.
        返回:
        SQLiteDatabase.

      • getWriter

        protected final android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getWriter()
        Open the database when the write data.
        返回:
        SQLiteDatabase.

      • closeReader

        protected final void closeReader(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase execute,
                                 android.database.Cursor cursor)
        Close the database when reading data.
        参数:
        execute - SQLiteDatabase.
        cursor - Cursor.

      • closeWriter

        protected final void closeWriter(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase execute)
        Close the database when writing data.
        参数:
        execute - SQLiteDatabase.

      • count

        public final int count()
        The query id number.
        返回:
        int format.

      • countColumn

        public final int countColumn(String columnName)
        According to the "column" query "column" number.
        参数:
        columnName - ColumnName.
        返回:
        column count.

        public final int count(String sql)
        According to the "column" query number.
        参数:
        sql - sql.
        返回:
        count

      • deleteAll

        public final boolean deleteAll()
        Delete all data.
        返回:
        a boolean value, whether deleted successfully.

        public final boolean delete(List<T> ts)
        Must have the id.
        参数:
        ts - delete the queue list.
        返回:
        a boolean value, whether deleted successfully.

      • delete

        public final boolean delete(String where)
        According to the where to delete data.
        参数:
        where - performs conditional.
        返回:
        a boolean value, whether deleted successfully.

        public final List<T> getAll()
        Query all data.
        返回:
        list data.

        public final List<T> getAll(String columnName)
        All the data query a column.
        参数:
        columnName - columnName.
        返回:
        list data.

      • get

        public final List<T> get(String columnName,
                         String where,
                         String orderBy,
                         String limit,
                         String offset)
        All the data query a column.
        参数:
        columnName - such as: "*".
        where - such as: age > 20.
        orderBy - such as: "age".
        limit - such as. '20'.
        offset - offset.
        返回:
        list data.

      • get

        public abstract List<T> get(String querySql)
        According to the SQL query data list.
        参数:
        querySql - sql.
        返回:
        list data.

      • replace

        public abstract long replace(T t)
        According to the unique index adds or updates a row data.
        参数:
        t - T.
        返回:
        long.

        protected abstract String getTableName()
        Table name should be.
        返回:
        table name.
